entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `process.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd()` never finishes for `dotnet build` in unit tests in certain situations on Windows #34653
  • [NETSDKE2E] [Regression]With 8.0.100-rc.1.23414.11 installed, the RID shows incorrectly on Linux Alpine3.18 Arm64 #34627
  • Native AOT produces useless `native` directory in build output #34619
    8.0.1xx

Closed

  • Product version is always set to 1.0.0 #15771
  • System.Xaml not found in .NET 5.0 #15728
    Discussion
  • Cannot run dotnet tool from folder containing multiple project files. #15697
    Backlog
  • Unable to build release/5.0.1xx on Linux #15999
  • dotnet build with Microsoft.NETFramework.ReferenceAssemblies can't find 'Microsoft.VisualBasic.dll' #15712
  • File used by another process #33956

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable the backport flow similar to other repos #34654
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove platform from output path #34651
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add AdditionalRuntimeIdentifier if building from source #34650
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Correct command model for nuget trust command and subcommands #34649
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update onelocbuild to 8.0.1xx #34642
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix runtime pack selection for `dotnet build` with PublishAot=true and PublishAotUsingRuntimePack=true #34640
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34639
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial commit for dotnet sln configuration cmd #34626
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Copying the test project to the temporary folder is to change the hard coding of the tfm and package version #34624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update README.md #30085
    Area-WebSDK
  • One option for fixing the locked file issue in the test #34307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support option to not include platform #34530
    untriaged
  • Allow overriding ServerGarbageCollection in WebSdk #22420
    Area-WebSDK
  • .NET 9 branding #34645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • correct command model for nuget trust command and subcommands #34613
    untriaged

Updated

  • Fix redist.csproj build failure on SLN rebuild in VS #34587
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • When transforming web.config check if target framework is .NET Framework. #34618
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • First-run workload experience #34322
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • MSBuild terminal logger enamblement. #34606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Remove a nowarn line added for preview 1 #34345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable transitive pinning #34387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
